article_html: All is not well in the Barbie household ... Ken’s having an affair, and Barbie’s losing her head. Artist Dina Goldstein shakes up the ultimate gender stereotypes
text: All is not well in the Barbie household ... Ken’s having an affair, and Barbie’s losing her head. Artist Dina Goldstein shakes up the ultimate gender stereotypes
title: Welcome to the dollhouse: where humans get plastic fantastic – in pictures
